objects.specification: A polished wooden floor composed of light oak planks with subtle grain texture and a smooth, semi-gloss finish that reflects light, providing a warm and inviting appearance.
A smooth white plaster ceiling with a flat finish, featuring recessed sections prepared to accommodate ceiling fixtures and a minimalist aesthetic.
A smooth light-colored wall painted in a soft pastel shade, with a uniform matte finish, providing a bright and neutral backdrop.
A smooth light-colored wall painted in a soft pastel shade, with a uniform matte finish, providing a bright and neutral backdrop.
A smooth light-colored wall painted in a soft pastel shade, with a uniform matte finish, providing a bright and neutral backdrop.

A spacious teacher's desk crafted from dark walnut wood, featuring a large rectangular top with a deep rich finish, elegant beveled edges, sturdy straight legs, and integrated storage drawers on one side with brass handles, conveying a classic professional style.

An ergonomic high-back teacher's chair upholstered in dark leather with plush cushioning on the seat and backrest, adjustable height and tilt mechanism, supported by a black metal five-star swivel base with caster wheels for mobility and comfort.

A large rectangular blackboard with a deep matte black writing surface framed by a slim metal border in black, featuring a chalk ledge at the bottom and mounting brackets concealed behind the frame for a clean installation.

A compact white ceiling-mounted projector with smooth rounded edges, a prominent front glass lens, ventilation grilles on the sides, control buttons on top, and an adjustable metal mounting bracket, designed to project high-resolution images.
A simple cylindrical waste bin made of matte gray plastic with a smooth finish and an open top, offering a functional and minimalist design suitable for classroom use.
A simple cylindrical waste bin made of matte gray plastic with a smooth finish and an open top, offering a functional and minimalist design suitable for classroom use.

A tall bookshelf constructed from dark walnut wood, featuring five evenly spaced open shelves filled with a variety of books in assorted colors, supported by a sturdy frame with vertical side panels and a solid back panel, conveying an organized academic atmosphere.

An educational wall poster presented in a slim black frame, showcasing colorful diagrams, informative text, and illustrations, laminated for durability and glare reduction, designed to enhance learning and classroom decor.
